div.h1: Announcements (Some things will only be visible when signed into website)

span.span: - Please check this document to see what your elementary studentsneed to do for each week. You will see meeting schedules as well as assignments.Checking in daily will insure you are aware of any changes.

New York State Education Department's website

em.strong: Harrisville Central School has the following openings for the

div.span: Full Time Tenure Track Earth Science Teacher

Please submit your Letter of Interest, Application and Transcripts to Mr. Robert Finster, Superintendent, Harrisville Central School, 14371 Pirate Lane, Harrisville, New York 13648 by Friday, May 1, 2020.
